title: Safety profiling of technical lignins originating from various bioresources and conversion processes
content:
Publication date: 30 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 12

Author(s): T. Jayabalan, P. Pandard, G. Binotto, J. Gomes, X. Ceschini, A. Aube, F. Gondelle, F. Pion, S. Baumberger, A. Jongerius, R.J.A. Gosselink, E. Cozzoni, G. Marlair
